ygData.msgSnippet: OOC:  if anyone s interested, i ve got a god armor for anyone s char, if you want to use it. I m trying to set g&g up as the wheeljacks of the team ghost and

 OOC:  if anyone's interested, i've got a god armor for anyone's char, if you 
want to use it. I'm trying to set g&g up as the wheeljacks of the team

ghost and goth are busily working away in goth's quarters, which the duo have 
converted into a makeshift science lab. they are working on seperate peices 
of something that looks to bo quite large.
Ghost: alright, you ready to lug this thing outside? 
goth: yeah. hey, we don't have an alternate form for this thing! it's just 
gotta have an alt mode!
ghost: ya think?
goth: yeah! all god armors have one!
ghost: alright, if you say so...
       The two begin attaching limbs, as a crowd of bots begins to form.
ghost: Initiate dna scan!
       a flood of yellow light erupts from the large quadrupedal machine. it 
searches for acceptable forms. It finds a male bull elephant.
goth: alright kids, scramble!
                         "BONEBREAKER: TRAAANSFORM!"
       ghost and goth stand back watch as the huge elephant transforms into a 
slightly more huge mech suit.
 ghost: COMMLINK: OPEN.  if anyone's interested, we've got something that 
might make you guys really happy...



--part1_22.2320bf61.299185c3_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
